content:
end of summer sale | 

36 hours only

Surprise! We're having a super secret Flash Sale just for you, our loyal fans. But book fast because this offer ends Monday at Midnight!

Book now for your chance to score 30% savings on an end of summer beachside escape! Offer available most dates in August and September.

And remember, you won't find any hidden charges when you book with us. All reservations include:
-Free Breakfast
-Free WiFi
-Free Parking
-Free Beach Valet
